columns.name: name
columns.description: Configured Name of the Feature (and its Extractor)

columns.name: feature_type
columns.description: The type of the Extractor that generated the Feature

columns.name: game_unit
columns.description: The name of the game sub-unit over which the Feature value was calculated

columns.name: game_unit_index
columns.description: The index of the game sub-unit over which the Feature value was calculated. i.e. if the unit was level, the index indicates which level (1, 2, 3, etc.)

columns.name: app_id
columns.description: A string identifying which game from which the event came

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: A custom, per-player ID, only exists if player entered an ID on one of our custom portal pages, else null

columns.name: session_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the gameplay session
